Class KafkaHealthCheckConfiguration

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mesosphere.sdk.kafka.upgrade.old.KafkaHealthCheckConfiguration

  • public class KafkaHealthCheckConfiguration
extends java.lang.Object
    This class encapsulates the configuration of the Broker HealthCheck.
